name: ServiceElectric
0:
”Alexa, show me Tom Hanks movies”
”Alexa, tune to NBC”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Service Electric skill is for customers who have the SEBC TV service powered by the Elevate SaaS Platform from Espial Inc. (http://bit.ly/espialinc).

Use the Service Electric skill to control your TV experience with your voice using an Amazon Alexa-enabled device.

Free yourself from the remote control and go completely hands-free to enjoy a truly lean-back TV experience.

Tune to a channel, search for or play your favorite content, and even pause, fast-forward, or rewind through your programs.

You can say:
"Alexa, tune to channel 5" 
"Alexa, find Game of Thrones" 
"Alexa, watch Breaking Bad" 
"Alexa, pause"
"Alexa, play" 
"Alexa, rewind"
"Alexa, fast-forward" 
"Alexa, back 5 minutes" 
"Alexa, skip 2 minutes" 
"Alexa, resume"
"Alexa, back" 
"Alexa, next"
